text.jpText:
お互いに気が強かったからこそ、相手の
思想に飲まれず、それぞれの生き方を貫いて
こられたウオッカとダイワスカーレット。
text.enText:
Vodka and Daiwa Scarlet, both strong-minded, 
were able to go their own paths without care 
for the other's ideals.

text.jpText:
譲る気のない2人が秋の大舞台で……
全てを懸けて、ぶつかり合う！
text.enText:
Two people who are not willing to give up 
will clash on the big stage in autumn… 
with everything on the line!
